Articles.Content:
Recieves Star Trek Reference ™

Inserts Jojo Reference ™

Receives... ummmm... Dio? idk...

Inserts JNSQ.

Receives... you couldn't understand what it was before it jumped in your face...

Inserts a crowbar to open the door of the Black Mesa vending machine.

Receives Portal 1.

Inserts Liquid Hydrogen fuel.

Gets Oxidizer

Inserts Geometric Triptych\*

\*Unclassified Energy Signature Embedded In A Truncated Pentachoron
Recieves Gary, your local Mate From The Pub™ who tripped over a tissue.

Recieves my full support. 

Inserts 50% of a human attention span

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, The Dressian Exploder said:
> 
> 
> Recieves my full support. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Inserts 50% of a human attention span
> 

Receives nothing. Wait, what?

Inserts 200% of a human's attention span

Receives... ummmmm... wahts dis?

inserts Click.

Receives countdown.

Inserts keycard.
